title: The President of the Republic addresses a written message to the King of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
text: The President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune addressed, today, a written message to his brother, the Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques of Islam, King Salmane Ben Abdelaziz Al-Saud, King of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, brotherly country, as part of the permanent contacts between the leaders of the two countries, the examination of the aspects of bilateral cooperation, and the pursuit of the efforts to defend the causes and interests of the Arab nation.

The message was delivered by Ambassador Noureddine Khendoudi in his capacity as special envoy of the President of the Republic, who was received Monday in Riyadh by the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs, Walid Ben Abdelkarim Elkharidji.Â
